title: Wahoo’s End of Tour Flash Sale has Trainers & Accessories on Sale (and in Stock)
content:
Already going through Tour withdrawal? Can’t wait to work on those FTP numbers on your schedule? Wahoo gets it — with Wahoo trainers back in stock and on sale until Tuesday, you can level up your pain cave. The brand announced a flash sale today to celebrate the end of the Tour de France. It’s a bit […]

The post Wahoo’s End of Tour Flash Sale has Trainers & Accessories on Sale (and in Stock) appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
